attributes.action: Show disgust of the way MPs have been abusing their expence claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Show your disgust to the way all MPs from all parties have been abusing the their expence claims.

rejection.details: We suggest you re-word your petition to request a clearly defined action that you wish to be taken by Government or the Prime Minister. Refer to our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms for advice.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
